title: African Burial Ground National Monument: Multimedia Presentations
body: Multimedia       The multimedia section of the website shares interesting aspects of the park with you through audio and video presentations. "Westward Bound," a unique multimedia presentation conducted at our visitor center concluded in January; The complementary website can be found at the following link. The second part of this exhibition, which will debut in early March and focuses on sacred body art from the Omo culture of Africa can be previewed online at the following link.   African Burial Ground National Monument Open House Videos - June 2009
